DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine whether antipsychotic treatment is influence psychiatric patients due to endocrine and metabolic status and quality of life.
DOC.criteria: Gender male Age 1845 Debut drugnaive schizophrenics, Caucasians Consent given to take part in the project Complianceproblems Major lung/kidney/hart/lever disorders Abuse of alcohol/drugs Diabetes 1 and 2 Antihypertensive Anticholesterolreducing medication Patients under duress
DOC.keyword: Metabolic and endocrine changes in schizophrenic patients by antipsychotics treatment.
